name: INRequestRideIntentResponseCode
desc: Constants indicating the state of the response.

items.name: case unspecified
items.desc: There is no specified response code.

items.name: case ready
items.desc: You are ready to handle the intent.

items.name: case failure
items.desc: You were unable to book the ride.

items.name: case failureRequiringAppLaunch
items.desc: The user must launch your app to book the ride.

items.name: case failureRequiringAppLaunchMustVerifyCredentials
items.desc: The user must launch your app and verify their credentials to continue.

items.name: case failureRequiringAppLaunchNoServiceInArea
items.desc: You do not provide rides in the area requested by the user.

items.name: case failureRequiringAppLaunchPreviousRideNeedsCompletion
items.desc: An existing ride is currently in progress and the app canâ€™t book a new ride.

items.name: case failureRequiringAppLaunchRideScheduledTooFar
items.desc: The scheduled ride is out of the ride area and requires the user to open the app to fix the problem.
